name: Staff of the Elements
description: A powerful staff that harnesses the power of the elements.
looks: The staff has a long wooden shaft adorned with intricately carved symbols of fire, water, air, and earth. The top of the staff holds a crystal orb that emanates a soft glow in different elemental colors.

special_effects.elemental_infusion: Adds additional elemental damage to spells

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of the Mages
description: A legendary staff imbued with immense magical power.
looks: The staff is made of a rare wood from the ancient forests and is adorned with glowing runes along its length. At the top of the staff, a crystal orb pulses with energy.

special_effects.spell_power: Increases the damage of all spells by 50%.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Vorpal Sword
description: An enchanted sword known for its ability to decapitate foes with a single strike.
looks: The Vorpal Sword has a gleaming silver blade that seems to glow with a faint blue light. The hilt is made of black leather and adorned with a small sapphire.

special_weapon_skills.Decapitation: 25% chance to instantly kill enemies with a single strike.

looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A powerful staff that harnesses the power of the elements.
looks: The staff is made of smooth dark wood with runes carved along its length. It glows with a gentle pulsating light.

special_effects.elemental_fury: 20% chance to deal double damage with elemental attacks.

name: Silver Dagger
description: A small dagger made of silver, known for its ability to harm supernatural creatures.
looks: The dagger has a shiny silver blade with a curved edge, perfect for quick and precise strikes. The hilt is made of polished oak and engraved with symbols of protection.

special_effects.supernatural_damage: Deals additional damage to supernatural creatures.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that enhances healing abilities.
looks: The staff is made of polished wood and adorned with intricate carvings of healing symbols. It radiates a soft golden glow.

special_effects.healing_boost: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells by 20%.
